price: 19. Allah Sait ce que vous gardez dans le secret du cœur, et ce que vous exprimez ouvertement.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
